app.word: Customize the name of your tracker
Customize breadcrumb links, defaults to Application Name when disabled
Customize menu links, defaults to Application Name when disabled
Customize profile tab, defaults to Application Name when disabled
When enabled adds a tab to members profile for torrent uploads by the member
If enabled members can choose to make their torrent activity private on their profiles
When enabled only your followers can see your tracker activity

When enabled you can choose to keep your public profiles tracker activity private (hidden) from other members, Admins can still see your profile details always but guests can never see your tracker activity no matter the setting.
When enabled you can add additional IP address for the Tracker to connect to. For instance a seedbox IP, work IP, or another home IP address

When enabled torrents are downloaded and a special unique passkey is embedded in the file and announce URL. This ensures only users with a passkey can connect, when coupled with IP rules this prevents non members from accessing the tracker
Your public profile tracker activity is only visible to Administrators
Your public profile tracker activity is visible to all Members
Your public profile tracker activity is only visible to Followers and Administrators
Your announce URL for creating torrents
Tracker will only accept private torrents
Tracker will only accept SSL secure connections
Tracker will accept non-SSL insecure connections
Tracker will only accept announce with unique passkey
Tracker will accept announce with no unique passkey
Warning! If you generate a new passkey all torrents using the previous key will be obsolete and you will need to redownload them to get the new passkey
Admin has required Seedbox Registration on all accounts
Admin has forced IP Bind connection member live IP must match stored IP
You can choose to force IP Bind your account or not
IP address secuirty measure which allows only known IP addresses to connect
Admin has allowed optional IP Bind for members
Tracker will accept additional IPs if set for account
Tracker will not accept additional IPs
Tracker will register seedbox IPs there may be Admin restrictions
Tracker will not register seedbox IPs

This will enable a public torrent tracker on your system where members can upload torrents with public tracker announce. If you have enabled private announce this feature will be disabled automatically. You can either run a private tracker or a public tracker but not both. If you switch from public tracker to private tracker all public torrents will be disabled and vice-versa.
Allow all trackers except the trackers specified

If disabled you can only host remote public torrent trackers (NOT recommended) on your BitTracker by using the torrent upload and import torrent URL option. If you want to host your own private announce then enable and set the options below. Be sure and check security options as well when using a private announce for optimal security and privacy for your members. If enabled public trackers will be disabled and filter settings ignored.
The above is your announce URL. You should enable perm key option for privacy. Also suggest a SSL/HTTPS only tracker for encryption security.
The time, in minutes, to scrape the announce and update all data on the tracker. Warning setting too low can cause resources issues on large trackers. Default is 20 minutes for optimal performance.

This will secure your tracker with SSL encrypted connections. You must have a valid SSL certificate for the domain announce URL. You can install a Free SSL from Lets Encrypt, more details and instructions can be found here

If enabled this will generate a unique permkey for members to connect to your tracker enhancing its privacy. To further strengthen privacy and security for your members, using our triple secure tracker, use SSL only announce and IP access options available below.

When enabled only IP addresses of members located in the database will allow connections. This prevents non members from trying to access tracker. When disabled any IP can connect to the tracker. When used in conjunction with passkey makes your tracker private and secure for your members.
Bind member IP to connection IP
When enabled member can only connect from the IP address in the database. This guarantees only members can connect but has drawbacks for those with constantly changing dynamic IPs.
Can members with seedboxes access the tracker?
Force member to register seedbox IP?

When using IP address connections per member this must be enbled in order to allow seedbox access. Member will have a setting to enter their seedbox IP into the database in order to secure unique connection to your tracker.
Allow all seedbox IPs except the IPs specified
Allow only the all seedbox IPs specified

When enabled your connection will bind to the IP address stored, your current/live IP must match to connect. This is beneficial for those with static IPs, those with constantly changing dynamic IPs possibly have IP connection issues
Restored a previous version for a file: %s
Toggled visibility for a previous version for a file: %s
Deleted a previous version for a file: %s
You may want to disable to use this category as a container for other subcategories.
Images can be submitted with files to provide screenshots or other accompanying images to show in the file listing.
NFO file can be submitted with files to provide information to show in the file listing.
Requires download log to be on.
Before downloading you must agree to the following terms...
You can define specific error messages to use within this category. If not provided, a generic error message will be used.
Other staff members are always able to see this information.
If enabled, when a new version of a file is uploaded, the previous version is stored and remains available.

This will reset the number of downloads for each file in this category to the number of records currently in the log. If you have updated the log settings, you will need to save them before running this tool. This action is irreversible.
Allow file submitter to view log?
You can also control which members can view the log from the group settings.
By submitting a file you agree to the following terms:
Post a topic when a file is submitted?
Delete topic if file is deleted?
Will be able to move files only between the categories they can create new content within.
Can recommend comments on a file?
Can remove comment recommendations on a file?
Only content that is available to guests will be shown. For more options, create a Custom RSS Feed
Users that are allowed to make URL submissions will not be able to use URLs from the specified domains.
If enabled, users will not be able to obtain a URL which directly downloads a file; users will always have to go through the file's page.

The image provided will be overlaid on all screenshot images (for example, to show a copyright message). For best results, use a small image with a transparent background.

Rebuild Existing Screenshots
Note that the download log can be disabled per-category and cleared periodically.
Select which categories to display on index.
The number of torrents diplayed per category on index.
This will throttle torrents to the maximum speed set. If set too low, this may cause your server to time out and the download to fail.
Time user must wait before download starts

When an author uploads a new version of a file within a category that has versioning enabled, the previous version is stored and is available for download. When this setting is enabled, the user will be given the option to not store the previous version when uploading a new version, and will be able to restore, hide and delete their previous versions.
The user needs permission to edit the file.
You may only download files after you have made {# [1:post][?:posts]}.

These settings rely on the download log which can be disabled per-category and cleared periodically. If using these settings, it is recommended that you leave the log turned on and set not to clear otherwise you may experience unexpected behavior.
Can import torrents from the filesystem?
When enabled, users will be able to import files located on your server. You should only enable this for staff groups where all the users are trusted.
Can submit multiple torrents at once?
The Bitracker option "Enable Latest Files RSS feed" is currently disabled. Toggle this option to yes in the admin control panel to enable the latest files RSS feed.
Notify me when other comments are posted
This torrent has a linked file, but you are no longer permitted to edit it. Please contact an administrator if you need to change it.
The primary screenshot is used in category listings.
You are not allowed to download that file.
You are not allowed to upload files to this category.
The previous version will be archived and users will still be able to download it.
See the version history for this file
Your file is ready for download. Before downloading, you must agree to the following terms:
Agree to the terms above and download file
This file is not yet approved and is only visible to staff.
The file you submitted must be approved by a staff member before it will be visible
No changelog available for this version.
Are you sure you want to restore version %s?
Are you sure you want to delete version %s?
You may only download {# [1:file][?:files]} at a time. Wait until {!# [1:your other download has][?:some of your other torrents have]} finished, then try again.
You may only download %s per day. You will be able to download this file after %s.
You may only download %s per week. You will be able to download this file after %s.
You may only download %s per month. The file you are trying to download is %s which is above your limit.
You may only download %s per day. The file you are trying to download is %s which is above your limit.
You may only download %s per week. The file you are trying to download is %s which is above your limit.
You may only download {# [1:file][?:files]} per day. You will be able to download this file after %s.
You may only download {# [1:file][?:files]} per week. You will be able to download this file after %s.
You may only download {# [1:file][?:files]} per month. You will be able to download this file after %s.
You must upload or link to at least one torrent.
You must upload or link to at least one screenshot.

%s is a directory. You must specify the path to a file.

If enabled user is banned from using the Tracker Application.
You have been banned from accessing the tracker.
If this is disabled, the user will not be able to submit any torrents. If enabled, per-category settings will be honored.
%d% of total; average for all users: %d
* This statistic comes from the download log which may be disabled on a per-category basis or set to be pruned periodically.
This data comes from the download log which may be disabled on a per-category basis or set to be pruned periodically.

If enabled, users who have permission will be able to submit files which must be paid for in order to download.
You can control which groups can submit paid files from the Groups page.
When someone purchases a paid file, the money will be added to the file submitter's account credit. You can control how users can withdraw account credit from the Withdrawals page.

The percentage specified will be deducted from the amount given to the file submitter. For example, if you set this to 10% and someone buys a file for $10, the submitter will be given $9 and $1 will be kept for the site.

The amount specified will be deducted from the amount given to the file submitter. For example, if you set this to $1 and someone buys a file for $10, the submitter will be given $9 and $1 will be kept for the site.
Unpaid files will always show the number of downloads.
Customers will only be able to pay for this product and renewals with the payment methods selected.
In order to allow users to charge for files you must enable paid files.
Can download paid files without paying?
Users who have an active purchase of one of the selected products will be able to download this file.
No renewals - once a user has purchased this file they will be able to download all future versions.
I will specify renewal terms. Users must have paid the renewal fee in order to download the current version.
Once the file is saved, renewal terms cannot be edited.
You have not purchased this file or your purchase has expired.
%s%% commission, plus a %s transaction fee will be deducted.
A %s transaction fee will be deducted.
This file is available with one of the following packages. Please add one of the following packages to your cart to continue.
This file is not currently available in your chosen currency.
This file is no longer available for download.
A torrent I am following is updated with a new version
%s has uploaded a new version of %s,
%s has uploaded a new version of %s,
%s (Guest) has uploaded a new version of %s,

When disabled the portal view is the default IPS grid view similar to IPS downloads. When enabled the portal view is more reminiscent of a classic tracker view. IE: Rows in a responsive table which can be customized.
Number of features files to show
Enter the name of API site. e.g. IMDB
Enter the host url of API site. e.g. imdb.com
Enter an example url for your users. e.g. https://www.imdb.com
Enter the full API url. e.g. https://www.imdb.com/api
Private Tracker is enabled, you cannot access these settings.
Public Tracker is enabled, you cannot access these settings.
